mapper.select: SELECT id ,`name`,organization_id organizationId,create_date createDate FROM base_department WHERE name=#{name} and organization_id=#{organizationId}

SELECT bd.id, bd.`name`, bd.organization_id organizationId, bd.create_date createDate, bo.`name` organizationName, bd.remark FROM base_department bd LEFT JOIN base_organization bo ON bd.organization_id = bo.id WHERE bd.id=#{id}
